Uses of Package
scrame.exception

  • Packages that use scrame.exception 
    Package Description
    scrame.entity  
    scrame.manager  
  • Classes in scrame.exception used by scrame.entity 
    Class and Description
    GroupFullException
    Exception thrown when you try to register to a group in a course that has already full.
    GroupNotFoundException
    The exception thrown when you try to register to a group within a class that does not exist.
    IllegalCourseTypeException
    The exception when you are doing something that is not permitted for that type of course.
    IllegalStudentArgumentException
    The exception when someting wrong in the student details while registering.
    IllegalVacancyException
    The exeption when the sum of the group vacancies does not tally up correctly to the course total vacancy.
    IllegalWeightageException
    Exception thrown when the total weightage component does not tally up correctly.
    LectureFullException
    The exception thrown when there is an attempt to register to an already full course.
  • Classes in scrame.exception used by scrame.manager 
    Class and Description
    CourseNotFoundException
    Exception when you try to find a course based on the coursename, but it's not registered yet.
    DuplicateCourseException
    The exception thrown when you try to register the same course.
    DuplicateRecordException
    Exception made when you try to register a student to the same course twice.
    IllegalCourseTypeException
    The exception when you are doing something that is not permitted for that type of course.
    IllegalStudentArgumentException
    The exception when someting wrong in the student details while registering.
    IllegalVacancyException
    The exeption when the sum of the group vacancies does not tally up correctly to the course total vacancy.
    IllegalWeightageException
    Exception thrown when the total weightage component does not tally up correctly.
    NoRegisteredStudentException
    Exception when there is no student registered to a particular course.
    StudentNotFoundException
    Exception thrown when you try to find a non existing student.
